result.name: gsni-tellus-regional-airborne-geophysical-survey-radiometric-grids
result.notes:
Data were processed using Geosoft Oasis Montaj and supplied in three formats.

* Geosoft Grid
* ESRI Geodatabase
* ASCII Grid

Please note that the presence of ‘Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m’ in the grid filename indicates that the grid was generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

The following file are provided:

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_KAL_1
K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_KAL_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_KAL_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_KAL_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_THO_1
Th generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_THO_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_THO_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the Th generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_THO_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_URA_1
U generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_URA_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_URA_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the U generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_URA_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eTh_K_1
Ratio eTh/K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eTh_K_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eTh_K_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the Ratio eTh/K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eTh_K_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eU_eTh_1
Ratio eU/eTh generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eU_eTh_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eU_eTh_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the Ratio eU/eTh generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eU_eTh_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eU_K_1
Ratio eU/K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eU_K_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) eU_K_1_GRD_s
A sunshade of the Ratio eU/K generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the eU_K_1 channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_TOT_CPS
Total Count generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_TOT_CPS channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m.

##TELLUS_Radiometric (Minc from V3 gdb, cellsize 35m) D_TOT_CPS_GRD_s
A sunshade of the Total Count generated using the Minimum Curvature interpolation method, from data contained within the D_TOT_CPS channel of the Radiometrics V3 database, using a cell size of 35m. Shading parameters (inclination = 45 degrees, declination = 0 degrees).

organization.name: open-data-ni
organization.title: OpenDataNI
organization.description:
[OpenDataNI] (https://www.opendatani.gov.uk) is the brand name for the Open Data portal which facilitates easy access to Northern Ireland public sector data for both reuse and redistribution. 

OpenDataNI has been developed as part of the Digital NI initiative. Digital NI aims to help establish a culture within Northern Ireland that develops and enhances Digital capability not just through interactions with Government, but also with local companies and throughout communities. Within government the Digital Transformation Service is facilitating this cultural shift through a number of methods, transforming Government services, making data open and available and encouraging and coaching those who lack digital skills.

It is recognised that opening up our data is the right thing to do in terms of transparency, accountability and efficiency of the Public Sector in Northern Ireland. It has the potential to encourage new commercial opportunities and drive economic growth and innovation across public and private sectors.

result.title: GSNI Tellus Regional Airborne Geophysical Survey - Radiometric Grids

resources.description: This zip file contains a series of grids in Geosoft Grid format that were produced as part of the Tellus Airborne Geophysical Survey of Northern Ireland.
resources.name: Tellus Radiometric Grids - Geosoft Format

resources.description: This zip file contains an ESRI Geodatabase with a series of grids that were produced as part of the Tellus Airborne Geophysical Survey of Northern Ireland.
resources.name: Tellus Radiometric Grids - ESRI Format

resources.description: This zip file contains a series of grids in ASCII format that were produced as part of the Tellus Airborne Geophysical Survey of Northern Ireland.
resources.name: Tellus Radiometric Grids - ASCII Format
